Festival Kolams.description: Sacred patterns drawn during festivals and celebrations

kolams.title: Diwali Rangoli
kolams.description: A luminous Diwali rangoli celebrating the festival of lights with intricate lamp motifs and geometric patterns.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents the victory of light over darkness and good over evil.

kolams.title: Pongal Harvest Rangoli
kolams.description: A vibrant Pongal rangoli celebrating the Tamil harvest festival with rice grain patterns and sun motifs.
kolams.cultural_significance: Drawn to welcome prosperity and abundance in the harvest season.

kolams.title: Navratri Divine Feminine
kolams.description: A sacred Navratri rangoli honoring the Divine Feminine during the nine-night festival.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the Divine Feminine energy and victory of good over evil.

kolams.title: Ganesh Chaturthi Blessing
kolams.description: A beautiful Ganesh Chaturthi rangoli celebrating Lord Ganesha, the remover of obstacles.
kolams.cultural_significance: Invokes Lord Ganesha's blessings for removing obstacles.

kolams.title: Holi Colors of Joy
kolams.description: A vibrant Holi rangoli bursting with colors celebrating the festival of spring and love.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the victory of good over evil and arrival of spring.

kolams.title: Janmashtami Celebration
kolams.description: A divine Janmashtami rangoli celebrating Lord Krishna's birth with lotus petals and peacock feathers.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the birth of Lord Krishna, representing divine love and joy.

kolams.title: Dussehra Victory
kolams.description: A powerful Dussehra rangoli celebrating the victory of good over evil.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates Lord Rama's victory over Ravana.

kolams.title: Deepavali Lights
kolams.description: Traditional Deepavali rangoli with oil lamp patterns and geometric designs.
kolams.cultural_significance: Welcomes Goddess Lakshmi and celebrates light over darkness.

kolams.title: Kali Puja Power
kolams.description: Intense Kali Puja rangoli honoring the fierce protective goddess.
kolams.cultural_significance: Honors Goddess Kali's power to destroy evil and protect devotees.

kolams.title: Karva Chauth Moon
kolams.description: Sacred Karva Chauth rangoli with moon and paisley patterns for marital bliss.
kolams.cultural_significance: Drawn by married women for their husbands' long life.

kolams.title: Makar Sankranti Kites
kolams.description: Cheerful Makar Sankranti rangoli with colorful diamond kite patterns.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the sun's northward journey and harvest season.

kolams.title: Raksha Bandhan Bond
kolams.description: Beautiful Raksha Bandhan rangoli celebrating the brother-sister bond.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the protective bond between siblings.

kolams.title: Ramnavami Divine
kolams.description: Sacred Ramnavami rangoli celebrating Lord Rama's birth.
kolams.cultural_significance: Honors Lord Rama's divine qualities and teachings.

kolams.title: Shivratri Sacred
kolams.description: Powerful Shivratri rangoli with sacred symbols honoring Lord Shiva.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates Lord Shiva's cosmic dance and divine power.

kolams.title: Ugadi New Year
kolams.description: Fresh Ugadi rangoli welcoming the Telugu and Kannada new year.
kolams.cultural_significance: Marks the beginning of a new year with hope and prosperity.

kolams.title: Vishu Golden
kolams.description: Auspicious Vishu rangoli with golden patterns for the Malayalam new year.
kolams.cultural_significance: Brings prosperity and good fortune for the new year.

Regional Kolams.description: Diverse patterns from different regions of India

kolams.title: Onam Pookalam
kolams.description: Magnificent Onam Pookalam from Kerala created entirely with fresh flowers.
kolams.cultural_significance: Welcomes King Mahabali during his annual visit to Kerala.

kolams.title: Baisakhi Wheat Harvest
kolams.description: Vibrant Baisakhi rangoli from Punjab celebrating wheat harvest and Sikh new year.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates spring harvest and formation of the Khalsa.

kolams.title: Bengali Alpona Design
kolams.description: Elegant Bengali Alpona with flowing lotus motifs and curved lines.
kolams.cultural_significance: Traditional Bengali floor art drawn during festivals.

kolams.title: Gujarati Mirror Work
kolams.description: Dazzling Gujarati rangoli with traditional mirror work and geometric patterns.
kolams.cultural_significance: Combines traditional rangoli with Gujarat's famous mirror work.

kolams.title: Rajasthani Desert Bloom
kolams.description: Royal Rajasthani rangoli inspired by desert flowers and palace architecture.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents the royal heritage of Rajasthan.

kolams.title: Maharashtrian Sanskar
kolams.description: Traditional Maharashtrian rangoli with Warli-inspired geometric patterns.
kolams.cultural_significance: Reflects Maharashtra's rich tribal art traditions.

kolams.title: Assamese Jhoti
kolams.description: Beautiful Assamese Jhoti patterns with traditional motifs from Northeast India.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents Assamese cultural heritage and traditions.

kolams.title: Odisha Jhoti Art
kolams.description: Intricate Odisha Jhoti art with traditional coastal motifs.
kolams.cultural_significance: Ancient Odishan art form with coastal influences.

kolams.title: Kashmiri Patterns
kolams.description: Delicate Kashmiri rangoli patterns inspired by the valley's natural beauty.
kolams.cultural_significance: Reflects the natural beauty and craftsmanship of Kashmir.

kolams.title: Himachali Folk Art
kolams.description: Traditional Himachali folk rangoli with mountain and nature motifs.
kolams.cultural_significance: Mountain folk art traditions of Himachal Pradesh.

kolams.title: Uttarakhand Hills
kolams.description: Beautiful Uttarakhand hill station rangoli with alpine flower patterns.
kolams.cultural_significance: Celebrates the natural beauty of Uttarakhand hills.

kolams.title: Digital Animal Spirit - Elephant
kolams.description: AI-generated rangoli featuring majestic elephant motifs symbolizing wisdom and strength.
kolams.cultural_significance: Elephants represent Ganesha, the remover of obstacles.

kolams.title: Digital Animal Spirit - Peacock
kolams.description: Stunning AI-created peacock rangoli showcasing the national bird's grace and beauty.
kolams.cultural_significance: Peacocks are associated with Saraswati, goddess of knowledge.

kolams.title: Digital Floral Symphony 1
kolams.description: AI-generated floral rangoli reimagining traditional flower patterns through algorithms.
kolams.cultural_significance: Flowers represent purity, beauty, and devotion.

kolams.title: Neural Network Mandala
kolams.description: Sophisticated AI mandala created through deep learning networks.
kolams.cultural_significance: Demonstrates AI's ability to discover mathematical patterns in sacred geometry.

kolams.title: Quantum Floral Pattern
kolams.description: AI-generated rangoli inspired by quantum physics and floral fractals.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents unity of science and spirituality.

kolams.title: Digital Lotus Transcendence
kolams.description: AI-created lotus rangoli transcending traditional boundaries through algorithms.
kolams.cultural_significance: Lotus symbolizes purity and enlightenment.

kolams.title: Algorithmic Sacred Geometry
kolams.description: AI pattern exploring sacred geometry through computational algorithms.
kolams.cultural_significance: Bridges ancient sacred geometry with modern algorithms.

kolams.title: Digital Mandala Evolution
kolams.description: Evolutionary AI mandala demonstrating how traditional patterns can evolve through computation.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents evolution of spiritual art through technology.

kolams.title: Computational Flower Matrix
kolams.description: Complex AI-generated flower matrix using machine learning algorithms.
kolams.cultural_significance: Demonstrates computational creativity in traditional art forms.

kolams.title: Digital Bloom Synthesis
kolams.description: AI synthesis of multiple flower patterns creating new digital bloom designs.
kolams.cultural_significance: Shows how AI can synthesize traditional patterns into new forms.

kolams.title: Fractal Flower Network
kolams.description: Intricate fractal flower network generated through recursive AI algorithms.
kolams.cultural_significance: Explores infinite patterns found in nature through technology.

kolams.title: Generative Art Mandala
kolams.description: Pure generative art mandala created through machine learning models.
kolams.cultural_significance: Represents the future of AI-assisted spiritual art creation.
